name: Iconic OS
short_description:
Personal web servers free users from the tyranny of web 2.0 website-as-service walled-gardens that force the sharing of IP and the wholesale dismantling of personal privacy.

Iconic OS allows users to access a fully secure and private personal web server via an iconic interface that is accessible from any web-enabled device.

Iconic is in essence a secured interface for the launching of personal server applications that provide specific functionality to users from a central platform and single URL.

Iconic is currently under development however several 'Iconic Apps' are already available as stand-alone personal server applications and will be incorporated in Iconic upon release.

These include: LifeCache and Datasafe.
summary: Iconic browser-based interface for personal web servers.
